channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - September 18, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-september-18-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Brinkwood: Refuge_ * _Cartel_ * _Checkpoint Midnight_ * _Coruscant Comrades_ * _Double or Nothing_ * _Eotenweard_ * _For the Honor!_ * _Free from the Yoke_ * _Haven_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Hit the Streets: Defend the Block_ * _Karanduun_ * _Labyrinth: The Adventure Game_ * _Masks_ * _Plutonian Shore_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_ * _Urban Shadows_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - September 18, 2020
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Apocalypse Keys
  • Brinkwood: Refuge
  • Cartel
  • Checkpoint Midnight

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Hangouts category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar to play!
